title: Bikerumor Pic Of The Day: Ikeda, Osaka
content:
Photo submitted by Atsuki Tokuda, “The photo is taken from the Satsukiyama Observatory located in Ikeda city, Osaka. This route is popular to local cyclists which is connected to Mino Falls known for its water fall and autumn foliage.” We always love seeing photos from where you are riding and are happy to share them with our […]

The post Bikerumor Pic Of The Day: Ikeda, Osaka appeared first on Bikerumor.
author: Kristi Benedict
